text: Srđan Savičević (; born 14 June 1971) is a former Serbian football player. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Serbian footballers Category:FK Sloga Kraljevo players Category:Apollon Pontou FC players Category:Tampereen Pallo-Veikot players Category:Serbian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Greece Category:Expatriate footballers in Finland Category:FC Elista players Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Veikkausliiga players Category:Association football forwards
title: Srđan Savičević
